task.name: i.maxlik
task.label: Classifies the cell spectral reflectances in imagery data.
task.description: Classification is based on the spectral signature information generated by either i.cluster, g.gui.iclass, or i.gensig.
task.keywords: imagery, classification, Maximum Likelihood Classification, MLC

parameter.name: signaturefile
parameter.label: Name of input file containing signatures
parameter.description: Generated by either i.cluster, g.gui.iclass, or i.gensig

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Name for output raster map holding classification results

parameter.name: reject
parameter.description: Name for output raster map holding reject threshold results

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
